# Class LLMMatcherConfig

Class for configuring LLM-based intent matcher settings. Manages parameters that control how LLMs are used to match intents.

##### Index

### Methods

getDefaultValues

## Methods

### `Static`getDefaultValues

  * getDefaultValues(): {  
embeddingSimilarityThreshold: number;  
generationConfig: {  
frequencyPenalty: number;  
maxNewTokens: number;  
maxPromptLength: number;  
presencePenalty: number;  
repetitionPenalty: number;  
temperature: number;  
topP: number;  
};  
maxEmbeddingMatchesForLlm: number;  
promptTemplate: string;  
}

Gets the default values for LLM matcher configuration.

#### Returns {  
embeddingSimilarityThreshold: number;  
generationConfig: {  
frequencyPenalty: number;  
maxNewTokens: number;  
maxPromptLength: number;  
presencePenalty: number;  
repetitionPenalty: number;  
temperature: number;  
topP: number;  
};  
maxEmbeddingMatchesForLlm: number;  
promptTemplate: string;  
}

Object containing default configuration values
